text:
FLSA
§ 13(d) provides an exemption from FLSA §§ 6, 7, and 12 for any employee
engaged in the delivery of newspapers to the consumer (see
FOH Chapter 23).
html: FLSA § 13(d) provides an exemption from FLSA §§ 6, 7, and 12 for any employee engaged in the delivery of newspapers to the consumer (see FOH Chapter 23).
